TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {136072=28 July 2015, 136583=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 216851=Apollo Hospital is in the Hospitals & Medical Services sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 18,441.74 crore. The company management includes Prathap C Reddy - Founder & Executive Chairman, Suneeta Reddy - Managing Director, Sangita Reddy - Joint Managing Director, Preetha Reddy - Executive Vice Chairperson, Shobana Kamineni - Executive Vice Chairperson, Deepak Vaidya - Director, Habibullah Badsha - Director, Rafeeque Ahamed - Director, Raj Kumar Menon - Director, N Vaghul - Director, G Venkatraman - Director, Sanjay Nayar - Director, Vinayak Chatterjee - Additional Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 508869 and the NSE with an NSE Code of APOLLOHOSP. Its Registered office is at No.19, Bishop Gardens, Raja Annamalaipuram, Chennai (Madras),Tamil Nadu - 600028. Their Registrars are Integrated Enterprises (India) Ltd., 137290=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 215540=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015}
